trans-unit.source: Defines an abstract base class for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> that processes security tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>.
Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> class.
Indicates whether the current XML element can be read as a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>.
An XML reader positioned at a start element.
The reader should not be advanced.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader is pointing to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether this handler can write tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handler can write tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Returns the URIs used in requests to identify a token of the type that can be processed by this handler.
The set of URIs that identify the token type that this handler supports.
Reads a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> from the specified reader.
An XML reader positioned at the start element of the token.
The username security token that was deserialized from the XML.
reader is .
The token cannot be read.
The password was not in plain text format.
An unknown element was found in the security token or the username was not specified.

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the password will be retained in the bootstrap token that is attached to the <xref href="System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity"></xref> that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken*> method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the password should be retained in the bootstrap token; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the tokens that this handler processes.
The type of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>.
Serializes the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> to XML.
The XML writer to use to serialize the token.
The token to serialize.
writer is .
-or- token is .
token is not assignable from .
